subprocess_flow.description: The Commercial Team conducts a thorough analysis of the target market to identify key segments and their specific needs. This involves gathering data on patient demographics, disease prevalence, treatment patterns, and competitive landscape. The team also assesses market access barriers and opportunities to inform the development of targeted commercialization strategies.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To understand the market landscape and identify the most promising customer segments for the drug product.
triggers: Availability of drug product for commercial distribution

step_risks_and_controls.control: Conduct thorough market research and data analysis.

step_risks_and_controls.risk: Failure to identify key market segments
step_risks_and_controls.control: Engage with key opinion leaders and patient advocacy groups.

change_management.change_request_process: Changes to the market analysis and segmentation strategy require approval from the VP, Commercial.
change_management.versioning_rules: Market analysis reports are version controlled.

subprocess_flow.description: The Commercial Team develops a comprehensive pricing and market access strategy to ensure optimal reimbursement and patient access. This involves analyzing pricing benchmarks, negotiating with payers, and developing value propositions that highlight the drug product's clinical and economic benefits. The team also works to secure formulary listings and navigate regulatory hurdles to facilitate market access.
success_criteria: Development of a pricing strategy that maximizes revenue and market share
Securing favorable reimbursement terms with payers
subprocess_flow.purpose: To establish a pricing and market access strategy that ensures optimal reimbursement and patient access.
triggers: Completion of market analysis and segmentation
end_conditions: Approval of pricing strategy and market access plan

step_risks_and_controls.control: Develop strong value propositions and negotiate effectively with payers.
Engage with regulatory agencies and patient advocacy groups to address market access hurdles.

change_management.change_request_process: Changes to the pricing and market access strategy require approval from the VP, Commercial and CFO.
change_management.versioning_rules: Pricing strategy documents are version controlled.

subprocess_flow.description: The Commercial Team trains and deploys a sales force to promote the drug product to healthcare providers. This involves developing training materials, conducting sales training sessions, and establishing sales territories. The team also sets sales targets and monitors sales performance to ensure that the sales force is effectively reaching target customers.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To train and deploy a sales force to effectively promote the drug product to healthcare providers.
triggers: Approval of pricing strategy and market access plan

step_risks_and_controls.control: Provide ongoing sales training and coaching.
Monitor sales performance and adjust sales strategies as needed.

governance_requirements: Compliance with ethical guidelines for pharmaceutical sales

change_management.change_request_process: Changes to the sales force training and deployment strategy require approval from the VP, Commercial.
change_management.versioning_rules: Sales training materials are version controlled.

subprocess_flow.description: The Commercial Team executes a comprehensive marketing campaign to raise awareness of the drug product and drive demand. This involves developing marketing materials, conducting promotional events, and engaging with healthcare providers and patients through various channels. The team also tracks marketing campaign performance and adjusts marketing strategies as needed to maximize impact.
success_criteria: Increased awareness of the drug product
Increased demand for the drug product
subprocess_flow.purpose: To raise awareness of the drug product and drive demand through a comprehensive marketing campaign.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Monitor marketing campaign performance and adjust marketing strategies as needed.
Develop a crisis communication plan and respond promptly to any negative publicity.

change_management.change_request_process: Changes to the marketing campaign require approval from the VP, Commercial.

subprocess_flow.description: The Commercial Team monitors sales performance and generates regular sales reports to track progress against sales targets. This involves collecting sales data, analyzing sales trends, and identifying areas for improvement. The team also uses sales reports to inform decision-making and adjust commercialization strategies as needed.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To monitor sales performance and generate regular sales reports to track progress against sales targets.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement robust data collection and validation procedures.

step_risks_and_controls.risk: Failure to identify areas for improvement
step_risks_and_controls.control: Conduct regular sales performance reviews and solicit feedback from the sales force.

change_management.change_request_process: Changes to the sales monitoring and reporting process require approval from the VP, Commercial.
